dialog.line: A long time ago, creatures named “Cubee” lived peacefully in their planet “CubeePlanet”. It was really calm but we saw prominently that something was missing.
The Cubee were bored to death. Nothing happened, in their daily lives they can’t find fun. They’re undoubtedly destined to be bored for the eternity.
However, a miracle appeared. An energy from a meteorite fall into their earth. It gives them an enormous amount of power into the “CubeePlanet”.
Can you guess who sent it here ? I let you imagine…
The Cubee were fascinated by this energy, they called it the “CubeeEnergy” in honour of their species.
Thanks to the CubeeEnergy, the Cubee are now in possession of power, but they didn’t know how this power can help them to defeat their boredom.
One day, two young Cubee play along and challenging each other in a race duel… it is then that one of them had the idea of reproduce this race duel in a large scale.
The “CubeeRunning” has born. Dozens of Cubee participate at this sport, they’re called “CubeeRunner”.
10 years after, the first “CubeeRun Tournament” was organized. Until this day, a saying went into all the memories : “If you’re bored, you can just run.”
A CubeeRunner will make a shift and dominate the CubeeRun Tournament, again and again, he’s the most strongest Cubee never know. He appeared in the 558th Edition of the Tournament.
They called him… Due to his armor... The IronCubee. And it’s important to notice that his armor didn’t have any scratch. IronCubee became a part of the CubeeRunning History.
But it’s not his history I will tell you. I’m gonna tell you the adventures of his son, CubeeRed…
Dad, your last victory was awesome ! How do you get so fast… ?
The secret of my power can’t be revealed easily, you have to deserve it.
All right, i’m gonna take the challenge. One day I’m gonna be stronger than you.
Aha, I’m looking for it my son. But before that, you have a long path to travel. Mine was very hard, yours will be lot more.
Time is not a problem.

Are you understanding what’s in front of you ? Your training will be very hard, sometimes you will want to give up but when you say you’re ready I will always be in your back and make you suffer if you think of giving up.
I need to become courageous… But the fact you’re my dad is enough to let me know that I can make it ! So, Where we start ?
I’m waiting for you tomorrow at dawn. Be on time. And especially, you’ll have to convince your mother…
Mama ! Today it’s my first training day with father !
Don’t say jokes, you’re too young. We talk about your father, the best of the best. His Training was not made for children.
I made a decision and I have to keep it. Believe in me mom, I’m gonna make it.

Reddy, I believe in you. But as your mother, I’m worried. Because I know how much it’s difficult. However, you make me think of your father when he was younger… I have to look at you like I did before.
Thanks Mom, I’ve waited so long for this moment…
I still listen to my son ! But if you want to give-
Don’t worry, “Give Up” is not in my dictionnary. Now it’s time...
I say it one more time… If you want to stop
I’m here, ready to become like you.
Great, great. So, Did you had a good night ?
Yes !! A great one ! But why this question ?
That’s good… Very Good… I mean, now you can suffer.
Don’t worry, I will survive father.
If you say it, that’s fine. Let me see your determination.
So, what have you done for my training ?
I think big you know. You’ll not the only one. In fact, I have a lot of disciples. I call at my butlers to help you in your first time.
Hi Boy, your dad asked us to serve you at your training.
So... my dad has butlers, so cool ! I hope you will be a big help for me !
Count on us Master.
“Master” it’s too much for me
The son of our Master is our Master too. It’s obvious.
Let him call you like that… He’s a bit too serious… But he’s right.
I’m not so used to but It’ll do.
Puff, I’m not gonna call him like Sir IronCubee. He’s my only master.
Boy, don’t worry, he’ll keep his duty to help you.
It doesn’t matter, I understand… Plus, you can call me like you want, I don’t mind.
Alfred, Jeremiah, William… In place !
Yes sir !
What’s happening ?
Be prepared, here your opponents of the day. They’re not the best, but they’re the most to grind and work hard. You should take their example if you want to follow my path.
Nice to meet you… I’m glad to see the son of IronCubee…
Hum… Hi !!
He’s a bit stressed, we can’t let a little Newbie defeat us.
Aha, let’s see…
Thanks to our training, we will beat you down.
Certainly I’m a Newbie but I’m sure of one thing. I’m as determined as you.
Ahahaha, he makes me laugh. As determined as us, he said. You must be joking little Cubee !
I can’t wait, let’s race !
Well, well let’s get started. Before you can take a real race, I’ll explain you the basics…
You’ll see, there is nothing complicated.
As you know, Us, Cubee have two jumps.
In fact, to jump you need to tap in the side rectangles. Blue for Little and Red for Big.
Then, The Cubee have in them a specific power. Some have awakened their power, others not yet… But keep in mind, to participate in the CubeeRun Tournament you have to master your power.
Yeah, yeah, for now among the disciples of IronCubee, just one have succeeded to awake his power. This Cubee is CubeeYellowTwo.
But while the training he will not use his power.
I didn’t know it was that hard… I believed that the others Cubee was like me…
Yes it’s really surprising ! You’ve awakened you power very early. You have to use your DASH and TELEPORTATION to win.
TELEPORTATION and DASH are very similar in controls. To use one of them, you need to hold rectangles in the center and drag in direction you want and finally release your finger to TELEPORT or DASH.
To Know : You can DASH and TELEPORT only one time in the air. You have to touch the ground or a wall to reactivate your power. You can combo the two in the air.
But I will have a big advantage against us !
The fact that you don’t know the circuit will slow you. Even with your power, you’ll have to analyze your environment to escape the traps.
Before the serious thing, can you show him what is a real race ?
Of course, with pleasure !
Aha, did you’re starting feeling uneasy ?
Finally, I’m a bit scared…
Son, a CubeeRunner do not have to be afraid of DEETH.
But why the Cubee come back at the starter ?
The CubeeRunning, with the CubeeEnergy, permit us to come back to life. BUT it’s only work in a race, only and only in this. Cubee are not immortal after all.
But, but… they feel pain after all…
The pain will make you stronger. This is why it took me a long time to start my training.
It really scares me…
It sounds bad, because now you can’t go back my son.
I know…
Courage is not a question of losing fear. Courage it’s when you have that fear in your heart but still walk toward and face them.
CubeeRed, you’ll get used to it. Even for me it doesn’t mean anything.
I remember in her beginning, she was crying like a baby after her first DEETH. Ah... I’m so nostalgic.
Master !!!
Yes !! I need to make a move even if I’m scared !
I wish you good luck my son.
There it is… Let’s race !
I’m waiting for you, may the best win.
Yes !! I finally won !
Good game. It took you some attempts to win against us.
My training was not enough. I need to grind more and more.
With the DASH and TELEPORTATION, I’m more fast. But even with my power, you still stay tough.
I lose but I keep smiling. A failure doesn’t still one if we get up and use it like a fuel. I’m willing to fight against you again in the future aha !
I face you when you want !
How was your training ?
Really tiring… And DEETH was always in my back. It was so tough !
If you’re that tired just in the beginning, will you keep pace ?
We are just the small fry because we arrived a short while ago. The next will be very hard little cubee.
It’s really intriguing, I need to keep it up and face forward.
Be prepared for the worst, because if you don’t follow, you’ll give up really soon.
You take a long time to beat the CubeePink, one month is not anything, but you did it.Congrats!
I couldn’t do anything without your help! Thank you!!
Don’t, it’s your determination which made who you are!
I have to not relax in my efforts...
And I don’t see my father today, where is he?
Your father went to visit Valkyrie, an old friend for few days with Alfred. He made us responsible for taking care of his training.
When he comes back, he will see that I’ll be strong.
Like father, like son... You are determined...
Pathetic... You just beat a beginner, and you already feel like you are strong... Kid, don’t get enthusiastic too quickly...
You’re wrong, CubeePink are impressive enemies. Stop saying everybody is useless, believe me, I had to facing up to them before.
You’re still young, you don”t know anything about CubeeRunning... Don’t think wining 2/3 races will make you strong.
I never say that, but you will see, one day I will surpass my father and you will look at me differently.
Ahahaha!!!
Who’s that...?
So you are the new one... And you want to beat our master...
Everyone can be strong with training...
Remember that it is not because you are his son that it means that you are strong as he is.
I know, only my raining will make me strong as he is. You are not going to teach me that...
At least, he deserves to be student.
You are mean to him... I am with you!!
Can we race just the two of us?
As you want, but don’t cry after the race!
... How is it possible? I follow all the instructions, but I wasn’t fast...
I lost...
I told you, you’re too weak... And here I was alone, but if CubeeGreenOne and CubeeGreenThree were here, you wouldn’t take this defeat...
How is it possible...? I couldn’t do anything. I better give up...
Don’t stop now, you’re doing fine! Your father told you... It is not a defeat which will get you flustered...
Jeremiah, you’re kind. But he’s right, I’m not my father, maybe the CubeeRunning is not for me... He beat me even he doesn’t have his power...
It’s disappointing; you are as pathetic as this cubee before...
This heavy defeat against CubeeGreenTwo has devastated CubeeRed, he has no more strength to continue his training...
Then he came back home after two months of training. His mother thought he winds up his training, but she was wrong. CubeeRed, couldn’t talk to her...
CubeeRed moped around his room for days... He stops eating in the living room... His mother tried to comfort him...
Redy, stir yourself, I know you feel too weak, but you can’t stay like that...
Sorry mom, I don’t want to train anymore...
Don’t say that, it is not just a defeat which will stop you.

It is not because of the defeat... I knew a lot of defeats at the beginning of my training... Then I mastered my power, and I was confident... But I coudn’t do anything against CubeeGreenTwo, he exhausted me...
A heavy defeat doesn’t mean it’s over... Listen, when I practiced the CubeeRunning, I went through a heavy defeat and guess who the winner was? Yes, it was your father.
Are you telling me that when you were young, you were a CubeeRunner...? And you faced dad?

Sure. I was a famous CubeeRunner... I was training your dad for the CubeeRunning. If I didn’t take care of him, he never became as strong as he is today. I was better than him, but he ended up beat me...
Waaaaah I didn’t know that, you should’ve told me before! And why did you stop?
Guess, you were born; I had to stop to take care of you...
You should’ve done both!
You’re kidding! You were running everywhere; I had to keep an eye on you! You have the race in you...
A failure like that is nothing, when I lose against your father, I was keeping training even I didn’t beat him anymore! Don’t give up! Train until the end!
You’re right! I must go back to training... But before race against the CubeeGreens I have to train alone
Not sure. I called the CubeePink, you probably beat them, but rain with a partner is always better.
I’m finally ready to face you...
You mean... Face us.
It is the same! One or three, I am ready to beat you this time.
Ooh! You’re coming again? I hope you know what you are doing. Maybe you will regret that.
Sorry, he’s hard with you. You’re not the first cubee he was trying to scare off... He was not always like that, anyway. I was exciting to face you, son of the renowned IronCubee.
Expectation grant...
How was I?
Congrats! You improved a lot. First time we meet, you already beat me...
Thank you, but the CubeePink helped me a lot. I’m lucky to wake my power up early...
It’s true that with our power, we are stronger, but they aren’t the chore of the race.
Right, I do not have to forget the main thing.
No, no, no, it is not possible. Why do you come back, whereas he doesn’t...?
What do you mean with “he”?
It doesn’t matter; it is not your fault...
is he then? I want to know...
We don’t need to talk about it, he is just a coward.
Years ago, IronCubee had three students, who came almost at the same time.
And what happened to them...?
One of them gone because IronCubee doesn’t have anything to teach to him anymore, another stop the CubeeRunning to begin an adventure more fascinating to him. There was only CubeeBlue left.
CubeeGreenTwo used to train with CubeeBlue. CubeeBlue though he could wake his power up, but learn that he was decifient, and that he could never use it.
CubeeGreenTwo suggest doing a game in order to lift his spirits, and was convinced that it was screw-up, and that CubeeBlue just needed to train,to manage and use his power.
What happened then...?
I won, and I was so proud, but he doesn’t want to race anymore, and never came back.
I’m sorry...
You don’t need to. Today, I lost, but I’m not a coward, I will not give up justbecause of that as he did.
Next time we race, I swear, it will be at the CubeeRunTournament... And I will be able to use my power...
That’ll be the day! I will wait for you.
CubeeRed, you’re better than I thought, but you don’t go up in my estimation anyway.
I know one day I will show you...
We will see...
Three month ago, CubeeRed started his training.
He is now become stronger, and thanks to his powers, succeeded to defeat CubeePink and Green in a very short time.
IronCubee had to left the city for a couple of days only, but his stay lasted actually two month….
During the night, CubeeRed, The CubeeGreen and CubeePink received a letter from IronCubee.
He announced his return, tomorrow in the morning. And invite all of them in a meeting at 10AM.
Why everybody is here… You all received my dad’s letter too ?
He summoned all of us, I wonder what are his plans....
Well, He really took his time…
Maybe he had some problems. He shouldn’t be too long now.
Oh, here he comes !
Sorry for my late… Serious things begin now…
You could warn us that your stay will take so much time…
I wanted to do it, but I couldn’t send letters where I was. But here I am now ! So, have you improved during this two past month ?
A lot, I defeated all the CubeeGreen while you were away. It was really hard.
You succeed to beat them in a really short time, I am proud of you.
Master, are we still your disciples ? I do not consider me like this anymore. Three month ago, you asked us to help CubeeRed to learn how to develop his powers...
But today, it is like if we didn’t exist anymore… You keep thinking of CubeeRed all the time…. It’s not because he is your son, that you have to abandon us….
Listen, three months ago, I ask you to practice with my son, but I didn’t asked just for his own interest, I was also thinking about yours. You became even better now !
During the training, I do not give him a preferential treatment only because he’s my son, here I consider him as a disciple.
I know that you must be frustrated, seeing my son’s power growing so fast. But you have to remember that each Cubee is different. Some of them need to practice more than the others.
CubeeRed has maybe defeated you, but I am sure that you can do it as well. You have to be patient because when your powers will awake, You couldn’t deny your strength.
I didn’t know that you were upset to see me improve so fast…

I have to admit that everyone thought like CubeeGreenTwo, but none of us wanted to say it… You have to understand, we’ve been training for so much longer than you, and seeing you improve so fast make us frustrated of our powerlessness…
I develop my power very young, so I don’t know what it feels like to practice without it…
Keep in mind that your powers are just a bonus in the CubeeRunning. The CubeeRunning is so much more important that some Cubee fighting with each other… You will understand it later !
Yes !!
You are right, Sorry for being rude with you CubeeRed…
Don’t worry, I totally understand… But I’m surprised to see you apologize !
You don’t see me like this because it’s not what I usually do… But it can sometimes happens… on extreme situation…
Oh you almost seem to appreciate him !
Don’t tell him this, or he is going to be upset again…
Oh just stop talking !
well, with all this story we forgot the meeting. Why did you summon us ?
I just wanted to see you of course.
Oh… Okay…
CubeeRed, don’t be so fool, You are going to down in my estimation.
It’s a joke of course ! I knew that there was something else…
That trip reminded me, I never run against you, except for CubeeYellowThree.
You want us to fight you ? You are going to annihilate us, even with my powers.
I was waiting for that since a long time !! Don’t be so defeatist CubeeRed.
But he is my father, how are we supposed to beat him ? We are still novice…
But he never said that is going to use all his strength.
It’s true, maybe we have a chance !
If he uses his power or not, it doesn’t matter. We get stronger only with powerful opponent. If we win or if we lose, We are going to get better anyway.
You are very perceptive, I made a good choice in taking you as my disciples. Guess the percentage of my strength that I’ll use against you ?
I would say, 70 percent.
This is too much, 50 is more plausible.
Hahaha ! You make me laugh ! For you, I will only use 10 percent.
This is going to be easy then.
Yeah, 10 percent, it’s nothing.
We can do it guys !
But they were all wrong, CubeeRed and the disciples were smashed by IronCubee, with only 10 percent of his power.
They were so far from the truth, They couldn’t believe it.
How this is even possible, with 10 percent…
You have to know that it’s not impossible to beat me. I win most of the time, but I also lost a few times.
We have to be a genius to beat you.
Don’t say that, particularly you. You can teleport you, so you can avoid my attacks. You just have to use your power precisely and in a intelligent way.
Understood, Let’s run again, this time I will avoid your attacks !
See, I told you, you were capable of it.
I will not get use to it, It’s so cool when I teleport myself…
Precision, It’s the key to win.
I wonder what would look like our training's if you increased your strength of 10 or 20 percent…
Well, I guess that one day, you will find out. Maybe that someday, I will face you at the top of my power !
It would be awesome ! Especially if I could beat you !
Right ! But without boasting myself, You will have to enormously practice before even try to face me !
Yes it’s pretty clear, That’s why I will practice vigorously on each training ! Even if it takes me years !
I see that you are full of enthusiasm my son, I am proud of you. The true CubeeRunner’s power comes from his strong spirit !
Well done ! You beat my master congratulations !
Yeah finally !
With you, it’s different, like you are his son you have to practice more, otherwise people will think that it’s hereditary. And it wouldn’t be important anymore…
Even if my father wasn’t IronCubee, I beat him anyway !
Hello son! I hope you rest well, because your training is going to be particularly rough.
Slept well, a night training will change habit.
Difficulty does not scare me, I will face the toughest cubee to increase my power.
Very well, let me to introduce your new opponent, the CubeeYellow ! They are my strongest disciple, you will have to redouble efforts to defeat them.
So you are the son of our master. I would like to say that is an honor to meet you, I would confess that I expected … better.
Never rely on appearance! Im much stronger.
Does not fit into his game, you will do too much pleasure. Let him chat in his corner, he will calm down! Pleased to meet you, I can not wait to see what you’re worth.
You will, see gonna impress you.
Pff, does not take this confident air kid, you can not even get me, does not even to compete CubeeYellowTwo, he is the best between us.
Ohh, so much flattery it does not look like you CubeeYellowOne! Well, let’s say I had a good master, And I practiced enormously.
Very good, I can’t wait! Let’s run!
But … But …. How is this possible… I used my maximal power to beat you… and CubeeYellowTwo, you did not even use your power… Not a single time… I thought I was stronger than that.
HA, what did I tell you? You do not had his level, you were seriously expecting to defeat him.
I… I thought if I use all my power I will make it…
Pff, ridiculous...
That’s enough CubeeYellowOne, you are his teacher, not his tormentor. Our master entrust you the training of his son to learn him something, not for lower him without lesson behind, get it?
Yes…
Good. CubeeRed, this is not the moment to dispair, our lesson is not finish yet.
How can it not be completed? Until now, I did not need to use all power to beat others disciple.
Explain me how I can compete with you, even at full power, I get defeated so easily? I can do more than maximum.
There is your problem CubeeRed. Your power.
I don’t get it.
You are fundamentally convinced that the power is the key to success. With power, you can beat anybody.
But, it's the principle of all CubeeRunner no? The greater our power is, best we are.
The power counts, but it’s only a tools, a tools that you manipulate, until using perfectly.
Except that the tool must be approached from a different angle, test it and use it in several ways, until you find some combination that works. You do not exploit all the potential of your power.

You take it as it is, without even trying to understand, I did not use my power, not only because you were not ready for it, but also to make you understand that it is not because you have awakened, it is necessarily acquired.
On the contrary, it is now that serious things begin, it is now that you must redouble effort. More you increase your power, harder it will be to go to the next level.
… I had never seen things in that angle… You really opened my mind! I tend to forget that I just entered the world of CubeeRunner.
I should have expected that the awakening of my power, is not the only thing that make me a good Runner. I must think, and no longer just act.
The race required not only the speed, but also reflection. I need to study and obstacle and opponent, to turn them to my advantage.
Well I see the lesson is beginning to think in. Are you ready to retry our confrontation?
Yes!!
YES!!! SUCCESSFUL!! I thought I could never do it.
Haha, congratulation to you CubeeRed! I knew you had the potential to defeat us. I see that you have used several approaches on the manipulation of your power, you did not just go in the pile.
you did not beat me in pure speed, you used feints and shortcut, that I haven’t seen coming. And you knew to use your power when you had to, and not because you knew how to use it. Good game!
Thank you professor! It was a real pleasure to face you! I learned a lot with you today. And I will remember this lesson my entire life.

I only did my duty. Just as my master did it for me. Did you figure I was in the same situation as you when I started? I felt special, because I was one of the few to have awakened my power, moreover very young.
I thought I was invincible, until one day I was beaten by your father. He taught me humility and anticipation. It is thanks to him that I am here today.
And I’m sure you’ll do sparking later. After all, you have that in your blood. Isn’t it CubeeYellowOne ?
Yes… I must confess that you have a bit impress me… But a little bit huh. Do not take the big head… I train even harder, and I will retry a race again you.
This is all order … I do not speak much but I will say two words to congratulate you.
Nice race, you did good job!!
Here is a very good training my disciples! I am extremely proud of you! But do not rest on your laurels son, you still have much to learn.
I know it now! I shall be even more attentive to the lesson I shall learn.
It’s just one year ago CubeeRed started his hard training to become a CubeeRunner.
In one year thinks happened, CubeeRed progress at a rapid rate.
This year, The CubeeRun Tournament gonna start soon, IronCubee will go tomorrow for the CubeeRun Tournament.
We are in the middle of the night, CubeeRed can’t sleep, he decided to train.
I knew you would come.
What are you doing here, you can not sleep too?
It’s always the same, every eve of my departure for CubeeRun Tournament I can’t sleep adrenaline does not keep me in place.
Wooh, you are hurry to face CubeeRunner who come all around the world… I am sure you will win once again.
Not necessarily, every year new CubeeRunner take part in CubeeRun Tournament. The level is high, I even had difficulty against some cubee.
So cooool !!! I would like to participate so much… Would like to face the best cubee of the world.
You have some courage, it’s good you need it to participate.
Maybe next year I could come with you?
Maybe yes but do not be so sure of yourself.
Why not… You don’t belive me, I have grown enormously since I started.
Fine if you say so, I see no reason to decline a fight against me.
A fight against you does not refuse, It’s so fun to fight you. Are you sure fighting before CubeeRun Tournament won’t exhaust you?
Don’t worry about me, you must worry about yourself.
Get ready to going down!!
Maximum power activate!!
Amazing your armor is even more stunning.
Let’s see if you became that strong.
Great!! I beat you the so-called the invicible.
So how difficult you find the race?
It was really hard!! You are not the IronCubee for nothing.
Ahaha!! So if you had difficulty against me how you could win the CubeeRun Tournament.
Wait… What do you mean?
I got you, I used only 25 percent of my power, You thought you can beat me with only one year of training.
No way, you are that strong.
The level of CubeeRun Tournament is widely higher than your training.
I thought my training would finish within one or two years.
You are way behind, don’t be hasty. Last year when I started your training, I didn’t know u gonna progress so fast.
So, Why I would not be strong enough.
That true you progress fast but you are way behind.
I can at least try.
Next year level won’t be enough to reach CubeeRun Tournament. If luckily you succeed, you will be released during the eliminator.
CubeeRun Tournament is that hard?!
Many CubeeRunner who have just begun think they will win the CubeeRun Tournament... Then they get soundly beaten... Most of them surrender this sport.
I knew there was many strong Cubee but not at this point.
You got too fast. Know that CubeeYellowTwo even with his power he still not participate to CubeeRun Tournament. He is training for five years.
Why he doesn't participate, he is not strong enough?
He had the level to participate but if he participates he won’t be the winner. Even using the maximum of his power.
I am impressed!!
You still have a long way to go, you can do better, you have not yet discovered all your capacity.
As soon as I reveal all my potential, I will show to the world my real power, and everyone would look me with fresh eyes.
I saw a great future on you, you will probably exceed me one day, I will do anything to bar the way.
This was the last time CubeeRed revived his father, He disappeared on the way leading CubeeRun Tourna ment, search was made, but no one finds him.
His body was not found, IronCubee was alleged death. Everyone attend to burial of IronCubee.
In the bottom of his heart CubeeRed, want to know what really happened and maybe he is not dead.
CubeeRed, Took the oath to discover the end of this story . He continue his training to become stronger and find the secret of his power.
He is not alone, others disciple are as determined, new user among students appeared and CubeeYellowTwo started to use his power, A rivalry between CubeeYellowTwo and CubeeGreenTwo creates.
They are not alone, CubeeYellowOne has develop his power too.
Even CubeePink without power remains determined, their will does not weaken. Saw others using their power make them hot boiling.
IL y a fort longtemps , une espèce nomme les Cubee vivait paisiblement sur leur planète. Tout était très calme mais on y voyait bien qu’il manque quelque chose.
Les Cubee S’ennuyer à mourir et rien ne se passe, Il n’arrivé pas a s'amuser. Il était sans doute destiné à s’ennuyer pour l'éternité

mais un jour , une énergie provenant d’une météorite tomba sur leur planète… A votre avis qu’il l’a envoyé ici , je vous laisse l'imaginer ... Les Cubee était fasciné par cette energy , Il la l’appela la CubeeEnergy en référence à leur espèce… Grâce à la CubeeEnergy Il sont maintenant dotés de pouvoir.. Mais les cubee ne savait pas en quoi cette énergie aller leur aider à vaincre leur ennuie.

Un jour , deux jeune cubee jouer et s'affronte dans un duel de course.. C’est alors que l’un eu l'idée de reproduire leur duel a grand echelle.. C’est ainsi que le CubeeRunning apparut.. Peu à peut des millier de cubee pratique ce sport..
10 ans plus tard fut organisé le premier CubeeRun Tournament.. Depuis ce jours , un dictons entra dans les mémoire de tous. “Si tu t'ennuie tu peut toujour courir.”

Un CubeeRunner parviendra à dominer le CubeeRun Tournament, Et cela plusieur fois de suite, il est le plus fort de tous , Il est apparu lors de la 558eme CubeeRun Tournament… Il se fait appeler IronCubee due à son armure qu’il porte sur lui.. Son armure n’a subi aucune égratignure… IronCubee est entrer dans l’histoire du CubeeRunning…
Mais ce n’est pas son histoir que je vais vous raconter… Je vais vous raconter l'aventure de son fils CubeeRed…
PaPa, ta dernière victoire fut magnifique… Comment tu fait pour être aussi Rapide…
Le secret de ma puissance ne peut être révéler d’un claquement doigts il faut l’avoir mérité...
C’est d'accord , je relève ton défis un jours je deviendrait aussi fort que toi…
Bien dit mon fils… Mais avant d’y arriver tu a un très long chemin à parcourir …
J’attendrai le temps qu’il faut…
Est tu bien après ton entrainement sera dur, et tu aura parfois l’envie d'abandonner mais on commence tu ne pourra plus retourner en arrière…
Je dois être courrageux… Quuand commence t -on ?
en t’attend demain à l’aube soit à l’heure. Et surtout avant de partir tu va devoir convaincre ta mère…
IL y a fort longtemps , une espèce nomme les Cubee vivait paisiblement sur leur planète. Tout était très calme mais on y voyait bien qu’il manque quelque chose.
Les Cubee S’ennuyer à mourir et rien ne se passe, Il n’arrivé pas a s'amuser. Il était sans doute destiné à s’ennuyer pour l'éternité
